title: SCI-FI UI SOUND PACK
description: A massive volume of high-definition sci-fi UI sound effects.
longDescription:
CLICK HERE for the video preview

Free pack samples HERE


The first volume of high definition and modern UI sound effects. Sci-Fi UI Sound Pack is a curated collection of modern sounds designed for futuristic and sci-fi environments. Each sound was synthesized and designed to accompany high-tech systems, computers, machinery, or weapons. A must-have for the serious sound designer and game developer looking for HQ sounds!


Discover

  • 900+ sound effects that you can import directly into your project
  • Scanners, Computers, Alarms, Transitions, and Menu FX for all your Sci-Fi technology needs
  • Over 400 MB of HQ audio content



Audio Preview #1: https://soundcloud.com/david-dumais-687079117/sci-fi-ui-sound-pack-demo-1

Audio Preview #2: https://soundcloud.com/david-dumais-687079117/sci-fi-ui-sound-pack-demo-2


Asset List HERE
technicalDetails:
Included in this pack:

  • Access Denied (40)
  • Alarms (203)
  • Bleeps, Blops, and Clicks (97)
  • Command Accepted (25)
  • Computers (29)
  • Data Processing (43)
  • Drones (16)
  • Interference (19)
  • Menu Sounds (130)
  • Power Up (76)
  • Power Down (34)
  • Scanning (20)
  • Transitions (52)
  • Misc (119)


Total Audio Files: 903

Total Cues: 903

Total Minutes of Audio: 40m 21s

Format: 44.1 kHz & 16 bit

Does Audio Loop? Some Yes, Some No

Number of Sound FX: 903

Target Platform: All

Documentation Included: No

Important/Additional Notes: No
